Reviews.Title: “Grand Moov”
Reviews.Author: ais-k
Reviews.Content: hotel value money size clean service fantastic staff reception friendly near main attractions taxis readily available hotel provide bus service beaches malls reception staff inform bus arrived passengers miss bus restaurant food service excellent night time extremely noisy due night club music dont suitable people children elderley sleep

Reviews.Title: “Good experience”
Reviews.Author: TravelAlong1980
Reviews.Content: hotel nice location diera airport metro station close clock tower vacinity nice neat clean breakfast lavish spread nice filling roof top pool nice word advice hotel disco top floor stay below level 5

Reviews.Title: “Not bad, as long as you are far from the night club”
Reviews.Author: Sir_Top-Hat
Reviews.Content: grand street deira dubai size upgraded spacious stays clean sufficient amenities drawback lower floors bound bit noise nightclub floor level try floors corner nightclub

Reviews.Title: “avoid at all costs”
Reviews.Author: karengiPortsmouth
Reviews.Content: hotel 2 star 4 star grubby hotel photos pool misleading junk storage towels shabby seventies throw staying sheraton deira 4 star dreadful checked evening

Reviews.Title: “four star rating completely exaggerated”
Reviews.Author: Jasveer
Reviews.Content: hotel night clubs operate daily 3 morning floor relatively quiet sixth impossible sleep buffet breakfast service appalling hotel shabby clean
